about.summary: yaml-cpp is a YAML parser and emitter in C++ matching the YAML 1.2 spec.

name: yaml-cpp
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "0.6.2" %}

package:
  name: yaml-cpp
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://github.com/jbeder/yaml-cpp/archive/yaml-cpp-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: e4d8560e163c3d875fd5d9e5542b5fd5bec810febdcba61481fe5fc4e6b1fd05

build:
  number: 0
  skip: True  # [win and vc<14]

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ compiler('c') }}
    - {{ compiler('cxx') }}
    - cmake
    - ninja

test:
  files:
    - test

  requires:
    - {{ compiler('c') }}
    - {{ compiler('cxx') }}
    - cmake
    - ninja

about:
  home: https://github.com/jbeder/yaml-cpp
  license: MIT
  license_family: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: yaml-cpp is a YAML parser and emitter in C++ matching the YAML 1.2 spec.
  doc_url: https://github.com/jbeder/yaml-cpp/wiki/Tutorial
  dev_url: https://github.com/jbeder/yaml-cpp

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - allanleal
    - marcelotrevisani
    - tadeu
